name: Imp-olate
overrideDescription: Deal damage to the front enemy unit equal to [trait0.power]x the number of [imp] units in your deck.
cardLoreTooltips: “Imps die for their horns to grow large. Demons die for their horns to grow sharp.” -excerpt from Hell’s Horns by Grrrg Onehorn, discussing the cyclical life of a Hellhorned and how their horns mature.
